name: Rleotha: Trial of Gods
summary: Help the young one complete the trial, set by the council of gods, on the planet Rleotha.

name: RLCraft
summary:
This started out as a simple little thing I was putting together for my own server and friends, and since then it's turned into something pretty ridiculous. I've gotten some requests about releasing it as a modpack so here it is.

RLCraft, the RL standing for Real Life or Realism and is a take on another mod I made for Unreal called RLCoop that generally has a similar goal, is my interpretation of what I've always wanted in Minecraft when it comes to pure survival, adventuring and RPG, and immersion. I hand selected many mods and individually tweaked each and every one to fit the exact play-style I was looking for, making sure they all worked fluidly with each other, adding my own custom scripts for various changes to vanilla behavior, etc.

Bottom line is, this ain't your dad's Minecraft, and you're going to die...a lot. Just be prepared for that. This tends to happen whenever I make mods for any game for some reason...it usually ends up being unfairly difficult.

name: RLChess
summary: Dive into the ultimate chess showdown with RLChess! It's not just a board game; it's an epic battlefield where classic chess meets wild party antics. Get ready for a chess revolution that's packed with thrilling twists and lively interaction. Charge into RLChess and turn the chess world on its head!

name: RLLL: Tower of Choices
summary: RLLL: Tower of Choices blends party-based RPG, deck-building, and roguelite elements. Roll dice to move, make choices that matter, and build your perfect party through class advancement and companion recruitment. Discover powerful synergies between artifacts and skills with each new run.

name: R-Lyke: Reverse
summary: Side-scrolling, retro 2D shoot'em'up with rogue-lite elements.

name: R'lyeh
summary: A story-driven, open-world, Lovecraftian Horror and Survival game with a scifi twist.

name: R'lyeh Assault
summary: Experience hot blinking action, in a brand new LOVECRAFTIAN TALE of uncanny terror! Destroy the All-Mighty CTHULHU, using the powers of the LEGENDARY NECRONOMICON , and free the fishing town of R'LYEH of his power and his DAGON minions. Will you save R'LYEH from CTHULU'S betentacled grasp, or will you lose your sanity in the process?

name: R Line After Dark
summary: A chill public transit themed rhythm game
